title: Jeter's Hire, Daytona 500, the Winter Games: Sports Business
itunes:title: Jeter's Hire, Daytona 500, the Winter Games: Sports Business
description:
On this Bloomberg Business of Sports podcast, Scott Soshnick, Michael Barr and Eben Novy-Williams discuss Derek Jeter's latest hire, what to expect from Nascar's Daytona 500 and who might cash in on the Olympics. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
